and press start.

during the sync process.

Or press the power button below
to open the quick menu.

Connection_Assistant_QR_Code_2_Main_Text:
Scan the QR code to download the
Fond Media Control app
Connection_Assistant_QR_Code_2_SOP1_Help:
Press the power button and select Wi-Fi
to choose an available network.
Connection_Assistant_QR_Code_2_SOP1_Main:
Ensure your device and this screen are on
the same Wi-Fi network to stream media.

Please check your password.
Crosslink_Host_Main_Text: A crosslink pairing process has been initiated.
Crosslink_Screen_Main_Text:
Please select the side of the vehicle
you would like to assign to this screen.
Delete_Device_Main_Text:
Are you sure you want to delete
this Bluetooth® device?
Delete_Install_Main_Text:
Are you sure you want to
delete the software update?
Delete_Network_Main_Text: Do you really want to delete this network?
Download_Failed_Main_Text:
Software download failed.
Would you like to retry?
Help_connect_via_USB_content: Media can be played through a compatible device connected via USB when using the Fond Media Control app.
Help_play_content_via_HDMI_content: Content can be played from a HDMI source when a compatible device is connected. Note: If no content is playing on the HDMI device when selected, the screen will appear blank.
Help_quick_introduction_content: The Audi Entertainment Screens allow you to view and hear content streamed from your mobile device connected via Wi-Fi or from a compatible device connected through HDMI or USB.
Help_view_content_using_cross_link_conte: To view content currently shown on the other Audi Entertainment Screen Cross-Link. Note: when Cross-Link is active, audio and volume controls are unavailable.
Help_wired_connection_content: Select BLUETOOTH to establish Bluetooth audio connection. If no connection is established, audio output is still available through a wired headphone connection. Alternativley, press the Audio sharing button to initiate audio output to the car‘s speakers.
Help_wireless_connection_content: Select WLAN to establish wireless connection between your device and the Audi Entertainment Screen. To connect your device either touch the [screensaver] screen and scan the displayed QR code or select your device from the Connection menu.
IVI_Delete_Confirm:
Are you sure you want to delete
{0}?
Note: audio output to car speakers
will no longer be available.
IVI_Main_Text:
Please select the screen as the Bluetooth®
audio source on the infotainment system.
The maximum volume will be determined
by the infotainment system.
IVI_Pairing_Failed:
Pairing failed.
Please try again later.
IVI_Sync_Error:
An error has occurred.
Unable to synchronise audio.
Please try again later.
IVI_Sync_Main_Text:
Select the screen as the
Bluetooth® audio source
on the infotainment
system. Reduce noise.
Press START when the
system is ready.
Install_Active_Main_Text:
Installing update
{0}% complete.

Please ensure the vehicle is switched on
until the update is completed.

The system will restart
once the install is complete.
Install_Available_Main_Text:
Software install available.
Would you like to install now?

During the update the system
will be inoperable.
Install_Delete_Main_Text:
Do you want to install or delete
the update?

During the update the system
will be inoperable.
Install_Failed_Main_Text:
Software install failed.
Would you like to retry?
Install_Successful_Main_Text:
Install successful. Software updated.

What’s new
- New/enhanced features
- General bug fixes
- Improvements to stability and security
Max_Volume_Notification:
Screen volume set to maximum.
Increase your infotainment system volume.
Menu_Help_Crosslink: Select CROSSLINK to view content currently shown on the companion screen. Note: if selecting crosslink when audio sharing is active, audio and volume controls are unavailable.
Menu_Help_HDMI:
Content can be played from an HDMI source
if a compatible device is connected.
If no content is playing on the HDMI device
when it is selected, a blank screen will
be shown.
Menu_Help_Input: Select WI-FI to connect to a wireless network. This enables you to stream content through external providers or to establish a connection with your device to share content.
Menu_Help_Intro:
The Audi Entertainment System allows
you to view content from a mobile device
connected via Wi-Fi or from a compatible
device connected via HDMI or USB.
Menu_Help_OTA:
To discover new features and bug fixes,
download the latest software from the
settings menu.
Menu_Help_Output:
Select BLUETOOTH to connect Bluetooth headphones
or press the audio sharing button to
send audio output to the car speakers.
Audio is also available through wired headphones.
Menu_Help_Output_SOP1: Select BLUETOOTH to connect Bluetooth headphones. Audio is also available through wired headphones.
Menu_Help_Output_SOP2: Select BLUETOOTH to connect Bluetooth headphones or press the audio sharing button to send audio output to the car speakers. Audio is also available through wired headphones.
Menu_Help_Source: Select SOURCE to choose your desired content. You can view content from external providers by selecting the service from the list shown. The browser can also be reset in this menu.
Menu_Help_USB:
Media can be played by a compatible
device connected via USB when using the
Fond Media Control app.
Notification_Full_Screen_Unavailable: Full screen mode is currently unavailable
Notification_Temperature:
Screen temperature too high. System will
switch off soon to avoid being damaged.
PIN_Entry_Main_Text:
Please enter the
PIN for your
Bluetooth® device.
Pairing_Failed_Main_Text:
Connection failed.
Please try again later.
Pairing_Failed_Wrong_PIN_Main_Text:
Connection failed.
Please check your PIN.
Reset_Browser_Main_Text:
Are you sure you want to reset the browser?
All account information will be lost
and you will need to log in again.
Screen_Off_Notification: Please tap the screen to switch on
Software_Reset_Main_Text:
If you continue, the system will be reset to
the factory settings. All individual settings
such as stored networks and passwords will
be deleted. It is not possible to undo this
process.
Are you sure you wish to reset?
Software_Reset_Successful_Main_Text:
Factory settings have been restored.
System will restart shortly.
Update_Available_Main_Text:
The software update is available:
- New and/or enhanced features
- General bug fixes
- Stability and security improvements

Would you like to download it now?
Update_Unavailable_Main_Text:

swUSBBootFail:

title: Quick Menu
Menu_Help_Intro_SOP1:
The Audi Entertainment System allows
you to view content from a mobile device
connected via Wi-Fi or from a compatible
device connected via HDMI or USB.
Menu_Help_Intro_SOP2:
The Audi Entertainment System allows
you to view and hear content from your
mobile device connected via Wi-Fi or
from a compatible device connected
via HDMI or USB.
Menu_Help_Removal:
To remove the screen from the seat,
pull the collar on the mounting arm towards
the rear of the vehicle then pull the screen
until it is clear of the seat.
Menu_Help_Install:
To install the screen,
pull the collar on the mounting arm
and push the screen into the seat
until the seat holder clicks in place.
Menu_Help_Secure:
To ensure the screen has located correctly,
pull gently to check that the screen holder is secure.
